value.label: Stand up for a better internet
value.heading: Hear from Mozilla Foundation’s CEO Nabiha Syed on why making good is about building ethical technology.

value.label: Mozilla Festival 2025
value.heading: Bold ideas shaping the future of technology
value.description: Join us in Barcelona this November for three days to unlearn and reimagine the role of technology in our lives.

value.label: Community
value.heading: How we make it matters
value.description: The internet is for everyone. Let’s make it good together with our community and yours. Hey, that’s what we keep saying.
